name: mdhub
headline: AI assistants for mental health clinics to efficiently run their ops
description:
mdhub is building AI assistants for mental health clinics to efficiently run their operations. 

Instead of seeing patients, mental health clinicians spend 50% of their time on other tasks, delaying access to mental health care. We aim to help mental health clinicians become 10x more efficient with mdhub by automating everything that occurs before, during, and after they see patients.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:machine-learning; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:mental-health; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Dominik Middelmann, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO of mdhub. Previous Director Product Ops @ TIER Mobility. Previously @ BCG

founders.name: Efren A. Lamolda, Founder
founders.description: On a mission to revolutionize mental health care with mdhub, I'm driven by the belief that technology can make mental health support accessible and affordable for everyone, everywhere. At the core of my work is a passion for creating impactful products that address real-world challenges in vital sectors.

Clinics Report Improved Efficiency
mdhub has truly transformed the way i practice psychiatry. As a clinician I have always sought tools to enhance my efficiency and accuracy in patient care. mdhub has become an invaluable partner in my daily practice.

Out of all of the AI Scribes I tried, mdhub has been the best and saved me the most time throughout my practice. With mdhub I have been able to become more efficient and elevate my client’s experience.
Marriage & Family Therapist

My experience with mdhub has been wonderful. All I do is open the app and hit the record button. The session is uploaded and the note is generated in seconds. I am no longer behind on my notes and am keeping up with deadlines.

mdhub has really changed the way I practice for the better. I am no longer staring at a clipboard or computer trying to take notes during sessions.I also don’t have to work overtime to catch-up on my patient charts. mdhub has been a real game changer.
Psychotherapist
**Landon, MD**
I have been using mdhub and can truly say that it has been life changing. I am once again beginning to enjoy practicing psychiatry. It is truly a game changer when it comes to restoring work life balance for so many physicians that are experiencing burn out.

**Shah, MD**
I have tried many AI Scribes and can confidently say that mdhub is by far the best. The excellent quality of the notes shows that mdhub was developed especially for mental health providers, so you don’t have to spend time editing the note.
Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner
**Osevwe, PMHNP**
## How it works
Seamless audio recording online or in-person, via mobile app or browser
Receive a structured clinical note in seconds with generative AI
Customize your sections and notes to reflect your own writing style
## Fast set-up, significant time saving, proven track record
30 seconds
to get started, no credit card required
2 hours
saved per day writing clinical notes

to return your monthly investment

### Watch mdhub in action
  * Set up in 30 seconds
  * Audio record via mobile or browser app
  * Receive instant clinical note


## Still have questions?
If you have any further questions, feel free to send us an email to: support@mdhub.ai
[How does mdhub's clinical Assistant work?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
To use mdhub, simply download our mobile app or use our in-browser recorder, ambient record your patient appointment, and receive a structured clinical note on our web portal.
[How does mdhub's AI Intake coordinator work?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
mdhub’s AI Intake Coordinator automates the initial patient intake process, reducing administrative burden and streamlining clinic operations. It works by:Collecting Patient Information – The AI guides patients through a structured intake process, gathering essential details such as demographics, medical history, and reason for the visit.‍Pre-Screening & Triage – It intelligently identifies urgent cases, flags key symptoms, and categorizes patients based on clinical relevance.‍Automating Documentation – All collected data is formatted into structured intake notes, seamlessly integrating into the provider’s EHR system.‍Reducing No-Shows – The AI can send automated reminders and follow-ups to ensure patients complete their intake process before their appointment.‍Enhancing Patient Experience – It offers a conversational, user-friendly interface that guides patients step by step, making intake faster and more efficient.‍By leveraging AI, clinics using mdhub's Intake Coordinator can focus more on patient care while reducing administrative overhead.
[Does mdhub support multiple languages?![Plus Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
Yes, mdhub accurately captures conversations in a variety of languages, including Spanish, French, Mandarin, Japanese, German, and many others. You can also chose the language output.
[How do I get started?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
Starting with mdhub takes 30 seconds. Sign up on our website, download our mobile app to ambient record or use or in-browser recorder. When you are ready to review the notes, access them via our web portal on your computer.
[How do I explain mdhub to my patients?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
You can inform your patients that you are using a secure and HIPAA-compliant service to assist with your documentation. Please ensure you refer to your applicable state laws with regards to obtaining patient consent.In the following link you can find a patient consent form and a handout that explains our data security and privacy measures.- [Patient consent form](https://www.mdhub.ai/<https:/cdn.prod.website-files.com/65421d636a315eff20bf6d7f/65f8a4e9b7db5a9f36a297c2_mdhub%20Consent%20Form.pdf>)- [Patient Education form](https://www.mdhub.ai/<https:/cdn.prod.website-files.com/65421d636a315eff20bf6d7f/65f8a4fa46ee580073e6bb7d_Privacy%20and%20Data%20Protection_%20Guide.pdf>)
[How does mdhub ensure Data Privacy and Security?![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae59a/654bd8fa66dc652b7afae5ed_plus.svg)](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
At mdhub, we adhere strictly to HIPAA's data processing and storage protocols. We employ advanced security tools like Drata to continually monitor our security posture. For more details on our data privacy practices, please visit our privacy policy.
### Find out how mdhub can help your daily practice
[Try for free](https://www.mdhub.ai/<https:/app.mdhub.ai/signup>)

## How it works
Seamless audio recording online or in-person, via mobile app or browser
Receive a structured clinical note in seconds with generative AI
Customize your sections and notes to reflect your own writing style

30 seconds
to get started, no credit card required
2 hours
saved per day writing clinical notes

### Watch mdhub in action
  * Set up in 30 seconds
  * Audio record via mobile or browser app

## Still have questions?
If you have any further questions, feel free to send us an email to: support@mdhub.ai
How does mdhub's clinical Assistant work?![⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
To use mdhub, simply download our mobile app or use our in-browser recorder, ambient record your patient appointment, and receive a structured clinical note on our web portal.
How does mdhub's AI Intake coordinator work?![⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
mdhub’s AI Intake Coordinator automates the initial patient intake process, reducing administrative burden and streamlining clinic operations. It works by:Collecting Patient Information – The AI guides patients through a structured intake process, gathering essential details such as demographics, medical history, and reason for the visit.‍Pre-Screening & Triage – It intelligently identifies urgent cases, flags key symptoms, and categorizes patients based on clinical relevance.‍Automating Documentation – All collected data is formatted into structured intake notes, seamlessly integrating into the provider’s EHR system.‍Reducing No-Shows – The AI can send automated reminders and follow-ups to ensure patients complete their intake process before their appointment.‍Enhancing Patient Experience – It offers a conversational, user-friendly interface that guides patients step by step, making intake faster and more efficient.‍By leveraging AI, clinics using mdhub's Intake Coordinator can focus more on patient care while reducing administrative overhead.
Does mdhub support multiple languages?![Plus Icon⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
Yes, mdhub accurately captures conversations in a variety of languages, including Spanish, French, Mandarin, Japanese, German, and many others. You can also chose the language output.
How do I get started?![⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
Starting with mdhub takes 30 seconds. Sign up on our website, download our mobile app to ambient record or use or in-browser recorder. When you are ready to review the notes, access them via our web portal on your computer.
How do I explain mdhub to my patients?![⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
You can inform your patients that you are using a secure and HIPAA-compliant service to assist with your documentation. Please ensure you refer to your applicable state laws with regards to obtaining patient consent.In the following link you can find a patient consent form and a handout that explains our data security and privacy measures.- Patient consent form⟨34⟩- Patient Education form⟨35⟩
How does mdhub ensure Data Privacy and Security?![⟨33⟩](https://www.mdhub.ai/<#>)
At mdhub, we adhere strictly to HIPAA's data processing and storage protocols. We employ advanced security tools like Drata to continually monitor our security posture. For more details on our data privacy practices, please visit our privacy policy.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: mdhub**

**Founded**: 2023  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S24  
**Website**: [mdhub.ai](https://www.mdhub.ai)

### Mission
mdhub is on a mission to revolutionize mental health clinics by deploying AI assistants that streamline operations. The reality is that mental health clinicians often spend about half their time on administrative tasks instead of focusing on patient care. mdhub aims to change that by enhancing the efficiency of these professionals, potentially increasing their productivity by ten times.

### The Problem
Mental health professionals are painfully aware of the administrative burden they face. As they juggle patient appointments, insurance verifications, and documentation, the access to mental health care becomes delayed—leading to a critical need for solutions that can automate these processes.

### What They Do
mdhub focuses on automating the many tasks involved in mental healthcare provision. Their two primary offerings include:

1. **AI Clinical Assistant**: 
   - **Automated Clinical Notes**: Generate real-time notes based on session transcripts.
   - **Dictation and Live Session Recording**: Transcribe and create notes during live sessions.
   - **Pre-Charting**: Use AI to reduce cognitive load with suggestions and pre-filled information.
   - **Treatment Plans**: Rapidly create treatment plans using patient histories and clinical guidelines.

2. **AI Intake Coordinator**: 
   - **Seamless Phone Interactions**: Collects patient information through conversational interactions.
   - **Insurance Verification**: Automatically checks insurance eligibility.
   - **Follow-Up Tasks**: Ensures timely reminders and follow-ups for patients.
   - **Reports Generation**: Documents and organizes information from patient interactions.

### Target Audience
The primary users of mdhub's technology are mental health clinicians who want to focus on patient care rather than administrative tasks. The company aims to enhance patient experiences while simultaneously improving clinicians' workflows.

### Technology and Approach
With an intuitive interface and seamless integration with existing Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, mdhub’s AI tools are designed to handle complex data processing while ensuring compliance with data privacy standards, including HIPAA.

### Initial Traction
While it’s just the beginning for mdhub, their vision resonates with many in the mental healthcare field. With the promise of saving at least two hours a day on administrative tasks, they’ve garnered interest from clinics eager to leverage technology to enhance efficiency and patient care.

### Conclusion
mdhub is planting its flag in the burgeoning field of digital health, particularly within mental health. By focusing on automation through AI, they’re not just addressing a critical problem but actively reshaping how mental health services can be delivered more efficiently. As they grow, it will be interesting to see how they continue to adapt and enhance their offerings in a sector that sorely needs it.
